releaseNotes:
1. Optimized the [Est. Liq. Price] value calculation under [Positions] in [Futures] and risk reminder.
2. Improved [Realized PnL] instruction in [Copy] to better assist trading.

Gate.io is dedicated to providing you with a better user experience. You are welcome to submit feedback or tickets to give suggestions. Thank you for your support!
description:
Gate.io is one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, offering the widest range of digital assets available for trade.
Whether you are just starting out or a seasoned trader, Gate.io is an ideal choice for those seeking a secure, reliable, and easy-to-use mobile app to trade cryptocurrencies with confidence.

Download the Gate.io app to buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and over 3,700 other cryptocurrencies.

Over 3,800 Cryptocurrencies
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), Avalanche (AVAX), Chainlink (LINK), Litecoin (LTC), and hundreds more, all in one place.

Safe, Reliable and Transparent
Gate.io is widely recognised as one of the most secure cryptocurrency exchanges globally. With leading security measures for logins, transactions, and withdrawals, we ensure your assets are protected at all times. Gate.io consistently ranks among the top for cybersecurity, as assessed by independent experts.

Features and Tools
• Price Alerts and Custom Dashboard
Track your favourite cryptocurrencies and set custom alerts. Follow market trends and manage your portfolio in real time.

• Spot Trading
Buy, sell, and swap digital assets through an intuitive interface with live pricing and fast order execution.

Earn with Gate.io
Refer friends and earn up to 50 percent of their trading fees through our referral programme.

About Gate.io
Established in 2013, Gate.io is a globally recognised platform for digital asset trading. We offer industry-leading security, proof of reserves, and services to over 10 million users. We operate in multiple jurisdictions and are committed to regulatory compliance wherever we do business.

Be Part of Our Global Community
X (Twitter): https://x.com/gate_io
Telegram: https://t.me/gate_official_bot/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gateioglobal
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GateioCrypto

Our services are available in selected territories based on jurisdiction.
